Class LoginManager

java.lang.Object
com.group6.hms.app.managers.auth.LoginManager
public class LoginManager extends Object
LoginManager provides authentication management for users, including login, logout, and user account management. It handles loading and saving users from a file, finding users by ID, changing passwords, and managing the currently logged-in user. It manages the users file I/O by delegating the responsibility to an instance of userStorageProvider, an instance of SerializationStorageProvider

    • findUser

      public User findUser(UUID systemUserId)
      Searches userStorageProvider for a User based on the given system user UUID
      Parameters:
      systemUserId - User's unique ID in system
      Returns:
      the User instance with the found user's details if it exists, otherwise returns null

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(User user)
      Deletes a specified user from the list and saves to the users serializable file
      Parameters:
      user - User to delete from the user list

    • login

      public boolean login(String userId, char[] password)
      Searches whether userId matches existing user in the list maintained by userStorageProvider. Then, hashes the input password and checks against the hashed password stored in the User instance Sets the currently logged in user to the given user
      Parameters:
      userId - userId to search
      password - (unhashed) password to verify
      Returns:
      If userId does not match an existing user or if hashed passwords do not match, returns false. Otherwise if match found and hash passwords match, returns true

    • findUser

      public User findUser(String userId)
      Searches userStorageProvider for a User based on the given user UUID
      Parameters:
      userId - User's unique ID
      Returns:
      the User instance with the found user's details if it exists, otherwise returns null

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(User user, char[] newPassword)
      Updates user password and updates the users serializable file
      Parameters:
      user - User to change password for
      newPassword - New password for the given user

      public boolean isLoggedIn()
      Checks whether any user is logged in
      Returns:
